00022     namespace boostserialize

00024         typedef boost::archive::text_iarchive iarchive_t;
00025         typedef boost::archive::text_oarchive oarchive_t;
00026 
00028         template<typename T>
00029         std::string toString(const T& serializable)
00030         {
00031             std::stringstream stream;
00032             oarchive_t oa(stream);
00033             oa << serializable;
00034             return stream.str();
00035         }
00036 
00039         template<typename T>
00040         socket::ConstBuffer toConstBuffer(const T& serializable)
00041         {
00042             std::string result = toString(serializable);
00043             return socket::ConstBuffer(result.c_str(), result.size()+1);
00044         }
00045 
00047         template<typename T>
00048         void fromString(T& out, const char* serialized)
00049         {
00050             std::stringstream stream;
00051             stream << serialized;
00052             iarchive_t ia(stream);
00053             ia >> out;
00054         }
00055 
00056         template<typename T>
00057         class Serialized : public socket::Serialized
00058         {
00059             private:
00060                 std::string result;
00061             public:
00062                 Serialized(const T& serializable)
00063                 {
00064                     std::stringstream stream;
00065                     oarchive_t oa(stream);
00066                     oa << serializable;
00067                     result = stream.str();
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 const char* data() const
00071                 {
00072                     return result.c_str();
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 uint32_t size() const
00076                 {
00077                     return result.size();
00078                 }
00079         };
00080 
00081         template<typename T>
00082         class Serializer
00083         {
00084             public:
00085                 typedef T basic_type;
00086                 typedef boost::shared_ptr<basic_type> basic_type_ptr
00087             public:
00088                 static socket::Serialized_ptr serialize(basic_type_ptr data)
00089                 {
00090                     return boost::make_shared< Serialized<basic_type> >(*data);
00091                 }
00092 
00093                 static boost::shared_ptr deserialize(const char* serialized, uint32_t datasize)
00094                 {
00095                     boost::shared_ptr<T> out = boost::make_shared<basic_type>();
00096                     std::stringstream stream;
00097                     stream << serialized;
00098                     iarchive_t ia(stream);
00099                     ia >> *out;
00100                     return out;
00101                 }
00102         };
